metadata.title: CVE-2023-31606 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) issue was discovered in thesanitize_html function of redcloth gem v4.0.0. This vulnerability allowsattackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a craftedpayload.

criterions.comment: ruby-redcloth: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
